item.description:
This is a great opportunity to renew this community of Tantrikas in the southern NH and Massachusetts area! Come and renew your connection to Tantra practices, to yourself, your ability to be present and to connect with others.

Discover how to truly experience new levels of pleasure in your life. This ANCIENT and REVOLUTIONARY work will teach you powerful tools that will allow you access to BLISS and JOY!!

What attracts us to each other?

Come and find out!

Experience full-body bliss that vibrates outward (wherever YOU direct it)!

Awaken your inner LIGHT for all to see!

Expand pleasure beyond what you imagine is possible!

Clarify your boundaries (this is helpful when you're socializing, isn't it?)

Create the ENERGY OF ATTRACTION!

The best part of Tantra is the fulfillment, confidence, aliveness and LOVE you experience within yourself. See what happens when you radiate it outward.

Send yourself soaring into the holiday season and right through the New Year!


DETAILS:

* We are meeting at The Watertown Center, 22 Mt. Auburn Street, Watertown, MA (there's plenty of parking!)

* Please arrive at 5:45 pm as we will start right at 6 pm.

* Workshop will end at 8 pm.

* Please bring $20 in cash to pay for the workshop

* Please wear comfortable clothing and perhaps something colorful and celebratory
item.name: Tantra Gathering: The Energy of Attraction
